title: Ep 461 | Phil Does Not Recommend Public School for ANYONE & the Verse That Reminds Jase of Uncle Si
description:
Jase and Al discuss fallen angels and the condition of redemption. Phil explains why he no longer recommends public education for anyone, and Al looks at the clues to a rebellion in heaven from the past. Jase jokes about the cultural phenomenon of the selfie and the lack of need for a mirror. Phil discusses the fight for a governmental fix for a spiritual problem and the epidemic of social media-induced fears and anxiety. And Jase shares his favorite verse that reminds him of Uncle Si.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed

Visit https://ScoreMaster.com/PHIL and see how many points you can add today!
